short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limit the number of tabs opened in a browser window. Close them when you reach the limit and restore them when there is a space.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables you to limit the number of tabs opened in a browser window.

It will close tabs when you reach the limit and restore them when there is a space.
